name: Arco Primo
tagline: Your first real espresso, every morning.
hero_image_alt: Arco Primo compact espresso machine in matte black finish on a light oak countertop, pulling a shot of espresso into a ceramic demitasse cup, soft morning light casting gentle shadows, clean minimalist kitchen backdrop with white subway tiles
headline: Simplicity, perfected.
subheadline: A compact single-boiler espresso machine that heats up in 90 seconds and delivers café-quality shots without the complexity.
description_short: A compact single-boiler espresso machine with 90-second heat-up, built for your morning ritual.
description_long: The Arco Primo is designed for those who want genuine espresso without a steep learning curve. Its thermoblock heating system reaches brewing temperature in just 90 seconds, so your morning never has to wait. The standard 58mm portafilter means you can use commercial-grade baskets and accessories as your skills grow. Clean lines, a small footprint, and an intuitive interface make the Primo the quiet centrepiece of any kitchen counter.
whats_in_box: 58 mm portafilter with single and double baskets
use_case_headline: Perfect for your weekday morning ritual.
use_case_body: The Primo is built for people who care about good espresso but not about fiddling with equipment before their first cup. Heat up, dose, tamp, pull — then get on with your morning.

pairing_products.rationale: A capable stepped grinder that pairs naturally with the Primo's approachable workflow.
